page.title: 07Entertainment in our D_block
page.content: To find out all about{Entertainment}we had to make up a{questionaire.}We went out into the streets of{Shortlees, {Bellfield}and{Riccarton}to interview people to find out which entertainment they enjoyed most. Out of one hundred people we interviewed, 28% of the people watched the television,26% read books etc. 10% went to clubs and 10% went to discos. 8% went to pubs and lounge bars. 6% went to dances and only 2% saw films at the cinema. The remaining 10% enjoys bingo, amateur productions ie. musicals etc. knitting and gardening. From our survey you can see that the most popular form of entertainment is watching TV and reading is the 2nd most popular. The reasons for this may be because of age,unemployment or simply that they enjoy the comforts of their own home.
